00214 template <typename T>
00215 const T* Repository::getObjectAsLC(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, WrongType, ValueNotSet)
00216 {
00217     return getProperty(url)->getObjectAsLC<T>();
00218 }
00219 
00220 template <typename T>
00221 T* Repository::getObjectAsL(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, WrongType, ValueNotSet)
00222 {
00223     return getProperty(url)->getObjectAsL<T>();
00224 }
